---

# Postmortems + Action Items

## Principles
- Blame-free; focus on system design and contributing factors.
- The value of a postmortem scales with learning and sharing.

## Action items rubric
- Specific, owned, time-bound
- Prevent recurrence or reduce impact
- Verifiable completion criteria

## Templates
- [Postmortem template](./templates/postmortem.md)
- [Action item rubric](./templates/action-items.md)
